related_post.text: I was wondering if everyone here knew why the `string` type in Go is immutable e.g. it\'s akin to `char const ` in C.

so_post.text: This is in java but I think the same answer found here applies on go as well <https://stackoverflow.com/questions/22397861/whyisstringimmutableinjava>

comments: Fernand asks question and Zulfiqar provides answer
